tournament.name: Starcitygames Open Series : Dallas / Fort Worth

decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also utilizes efficient card draw and tutoring through Squadron Hawk and Stoneforge Mystic to maintain card advantage and find key pieces of equipment like Sword of Feast and Famine. The deck aims to stabilize the board with planeswalkers like Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, while utilizing utility lands like Creeping Tar Pit and Darkslick Shores for additional advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and efficient burn spells. By playing powerful goblins like Goblin Guide and Goblin Chieftain, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By utilizing cards like Staggershock and Spikeshot Elder, the deck can maintain pressure while also controlling the opponent's board. The inclusion of cards like Tectonic Edge provides some additional utility, while Teetering Peaks boosts the power of the creatures for maximum impact.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game and outvalue the opponent by using powerful creatures like Baneslayer Angel and Hero of Bladehold, along with supporting spells like Mana Leak and Journey to Nowhere. The deck also utilizes equipment like Sword of Body and Mind and Sword of Feast and Famine to push through damage and disrupt the opponent. The planeswalker cards, Gideon Jura and Jace Beleren, provide additional control options and card advantage. Overall, the deck focuses on controlling the board and gaining incremental advantages to secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing powerful creatures such as Precursor Golem, Baneslayer Angel, and Vengevine. It also includes efficient mana ramp with Birds of Paradise and Fauna Shaman. The deck incorporates equipment like Sword of Feast and Famine and Basilisk Collar to enhance combat capabilities. Additionally, the inclusion of Stoneforge Mystic allows for searching and equipping powerful weapons to further pressure the opponent. Overall, the strategy revolves around quickly establishing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with a combination of creatures and equipment.

This deck focuses on using control spells and removal to dominate the board, while also utilizing equipment to enhance its creatures. It relies on efficient card draw and searching abilities to maintain card advantage and set up powerful plays. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides additional control options and win conditions. The deck aims to control the pace of the game, disrupt opponent's strategies, and ultimately overwhelm them with a combination of powerful creatures and spells.

The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells and board wipes, while also utilizing efficient card draw with Squadron Hawk and Preordain. Stoneforge Mystic is used to search for powerful equipment like Sword of Feast and Famine to gain advantage. Gideon Jura can be a win condition or a stabilizing factor, while Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides card advantage and control. The deck aims to outvalue opponents and grind them out using a combination of removal, counterspells, and efficient creatures.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence by playing efficient creatures like Birds of Paradise, Llanowar Elves, and Squadron Hawk, while also utilizing cards like Vengevine and Baneslayer Angel to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes tools like Green Sun's Zenith and Fauna Shaman to tutor for specific threats, and removal spells like Journey to Nowhere to deal with opposing threats. Additionally, the inclusion of Garruk Wildspeaker helps in providing additional mana acceleration and creature support.

This deck focuses on using control spells like Mana Leak and Day of Judgment to maintain board control while utilizing Blade Control cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Sword of Feast and Famine to pull ahead in terms of card advantage and tempo. Squadron Hawk and Inquisition of Kozilek provide additional utility and disruption. The planeswalkers Gideon Jura and Jace, the Mind Sculptor offer powerful win conditions while also providing card advantage and control. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements while also ensuring consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and board wipes while efficiently searching for and equipping powerful equipment like Sword of Feast and Famine. It also utilizes card draw and recursion to maintain card advantage and outvalue opponents in the long game. With a mix of creatures, planeswalkers, and utility lands, this deck aims to disrupt opponents' game plans while controlling the board and ultimately winning through incremental advantage and powerful equipment synergies.

The main idea behind this deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful planeswalkers and removal spells to maintain board dominance. By utilizing cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Gideon Jura, along with removal spells like Condemn and Day of Judgment, this deck aims to control the pace of the game and prevent the opponent from building a strong board presence. The inclusion of equipment like Sword of Body and Mind and Stoneforge Mystic allows for additional threats and value generation. Overall, the deck focuses on maintaining control and out-valuing the opponent to secure victory.

This deck focuses on using efficient removal spells and aggressive creatures to control the board and deal damage quickly. By utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Goblin Ruinblaster, and Slagstorm, the deck aims to keep the opponent's threats in check while deploying powerful creatures like Inferno Titan and Kuldotha Phoenix to pressure the opponent. With additional mana acceleration from Everflowing Chalice and Sphere of the Suns, the deck can quickly ramp into its big threats. Tectonic Edge helps disrupt opposing lands, while Chandra Nalaar and Koth of the Hammer provide additional removal and threat options.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Goblin creatures, buffed by Goblin Chieftain and Goblin Wardriver, while dealing direct damage with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Searing Blaze and finish off the opponent with direct damage or combat damage from the Goblins. Koth of the Hammer provides additional mana acceleration and can help close out games with its ultimate ability.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with fast and efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Plated Geopede to deal damage quickly. By using burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze to remove threats and finish off opponents, the deck aims to overwhelm and defeat the opponent before they can stabilize. Cards like Kargan Dragonlord and Teetering Peaks provide additional firepower and reach, while cards like Staggershock and Arc Trail offer versatility in dealing with multiple threats. Koth of the Hammer serves as a powerful planeswalker to generate mana and further ramp up the aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and powerful threats. By utilizing cards like Mana Leak and Lightning Bolt to disrupt the opponent's game plan, as well as cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor to generate card advantage and control the board, the deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and secure victory. Additionally, the deck includes powerful creatures like Precursor Golem and Inferno Titan to apply pressure and close out the game when the opportunity arises.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Lotus Cobra and Explore to quickly cast powerful threats like Precursor Golem, Avenger of Zendikar, and Inferno Titan. It also includes control elements like Mana Leak and Lightning Bolt to control the game state. Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides card advantage and further control options. The synergies between the ramp and control elements allow the deck to efficiently control the game while also presenting a fast clock with its powerful threats.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Joraga Treespeaker and Lotus Cobra, and using them to play powerful threats like Frost Titan and Primeval Titan. It also includes cards like Acidic Slime and Spreading Seas to control the opponent's resources and disrupt their strategy. Genesis Wave is used as a big finisher, while Khalni Heart Expedition helps with mana fixing. Jace, the Mind Sculptor provides card advantage and control. The deck aims to out-value and out-control the opponent to secure a win.
